content.en: Chatbot user experience: Researchers have been investigating the impact of AI-driven chatbots on user experience, including factors such as creepiness, trust, and satisfaction. They are also exploring how chatbots influence customer-brand relationships, loyalty, and purchase intentions. Additionally, studies are being conducted to understand the role of chatbot marketing efforts and the drivers and consequences of chatbot engagement and relationship development. These findings aim to improve the usability and responsiveness of AI chatbots in various online services.
content.da: Chatbot-brugeroplevelse: Forskere har undersøgt effekten af AI-drevne chatbots på brugeroplevelsen, herunder faktorer som ubehag, tillid og tilfredshed. De undersøger også, hvordan chatbots påvirker kundeforhold til mærker, loyalitet og købsintentioner. Desuden udføres der undersøgelser for at forstå rollen af chatbot-marketingindsatser samt drivkræfterne og konsekvenserne af chatbot-engagement og relationsudvikling. Disse fund sigter mod at forbedre brugervenligheden og responsiviteten af AI chatbots i forskellige online tjenester.
